data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Chaozhou, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chaozhou, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 202,542 believers in the county of Chaozhou.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary: On average, 199 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Chaozhou, Guangdong, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Chaozhou who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, guide the church in Chaozhou, Guangdong, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, French-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Chaozhou, Guangdong, China to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Chaozhou words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Over 90.8 percent of the people of Chaozhou are far from Jesus.

location.name: Chaozhou
location.people_groups_list: Persian, Malay, Zaomin, Tibetan, Iu Mien
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Persian (800), Malay (15,000), Zaomin (47,000), Tibetan (2,000), Iu Mien (1,303,000)
